name: BEELab
short_description:
BEE Lab is a system that provides a complete solution for designing
and executing behavioral and experimental economics experiments.

Primary capabilities:
A web-based client side that doesn't require any plug-ins

A high level of both usability and functionality

The capability to conduct singular or group experiments, without limiting the group size or the geographic location of the subjects

The capacity to execute experiment sessions both in an open internet environment and in a closed lab environment

The freedom to design experiments, with no limitation to a preprogrammed set of experiments or games

The ability to allow subjects to communicate with one another when desired

The capability to collect data dynamically, and to export data to an open format, such as CSV

BEE Lab’s robustness and adaptability allow designing publicly open experiments in order to invite subjects from external sources, such as Amazon Mechanical Turk and social networks.
summary: BEE Lab is a platform for designing and executing experiments
